group_1.narration: We immediately set off to find them!
After leaving the park, she guided me@around a bunch of places in Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: So you're a cheerleader, but you manage the@baseball team too?
And on top of that, you're a Magical Girl?@That's one packed schedule!

group_1.textLeft: Hee hee... I guess it is.
It feels like I'm living my life to the@fullest, you know?
You've been chosen for the national team,@right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but I've got some stiff competition for@that star player status.

group_1.textLeft: Is it okay if I ask you something?
When you became a Magical Girl, did you@want to wish for that?

group_1.textRight: Working hard to better yourself is@what's fun about sports, y'know?
Playing games, checking scores, going to@practices, then having re-matches.
Eating, going to bed, then doing it all over@again the next day...
That's, like, what I do to feel alive.

group_1.textLeft: I see! Yeah, I get it!

group_1.narration: Natsuki told me what's been happening@lately in Kamihama.

group_1.textLeft: There's more and more of them. That's how it@feels, anyway...

group_1.textRight: ...the Witch we were chasing was running @away to Kamihama.
That might mean the Witches here are coming@from outside the city, right?

group_1.textLeft: I don't really know how they're increasing@in number so quickly...
Just that I've had to fight more and more@battles with them.
My Magical Girl friends have been saying@the same thing...
She was attacked by a Witch.
